property.description_en: Experience the ultimate blend of comfort and convenience in this stylish studio apartment located in the heart of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), within the prestigious Villa Myra community. property.title_en: 1BR Beachfront | Fully Furnished | All Bills Incl.
property.description_en: Experience luxury living in this stunning 1-bedroom apartment located in Marina Vista Tower 1 at the prestigious Emaar Beachfront. This fully furnished residence offers a perfect blend of comfort and style, making it an ideal choice for both short-term and long-term stays. The apartment boasts a contemporary design with high-quality furnishings and modern amenities. The spacious living area is tastefully decorated and includes a comfortable seating area, a flat-screen TV, and large windows that flood the space with natural light. The open-plan kitchen is fully equipped with top-of-the-line appliances, cookware, and utensils, ensuring you have everything you need to prepare delicious meals. The bedroom is a serene retreat featuring a plush king-sized bed, ample closet space, and elegant decor. The bathroom is sleek and modern, complete with premium fixtures and a walk-in shower. Enjoy breathtaking views of the marina and the sparkling sea from your private balcony, where you can relax and unwind after a long day. Residents of Marina Vista Tower 1 have access to a range of exclusive amenities, including a state-of-the-art gym, an infinity pool, and direct beach access. Located in the heart of Emaar Beachfront, this apartment offers easy access to Dubai’s top attractions, dining, and entertainment options. All bills are included, providing you with a hassle-free living experience. Book your stay in this exquisite 1-bedroom apartment and enjoy the ultimate beachfront lifestyle in Dubai. Additional: Rates may vary according to season and availability. Agency fees applicable. DTCM (Tourism Dirham) AED 10 per day is applicable for first 30 nights. property.description_en: Sunrise Bay at Emaar Beachfront: Sunrise Bay is a premium twin-tower development, just steps away from the glimmering bay and vibrant marina, promising stunning sunrise views. The architecture seamlessly connects the mainland to the azure waters, drawing inspiration from modern yacht culture to blend artfully with its beachfront setting. The master bedroom is a luxurious haven, thoughtfully designed for your comfort.
